description: Occuring as rarely as a shy lunar eclipse, there are those magical moments where the planetary forces align just right and beam down to the door a specimen of breeder boy so perfect, he must be from another world. It's our lucky day- we didn't get an angel, we got a little devil called Aiden.In the center of that chiseled face is a pair of eyes like blue agate marbles that make it almost impossible to travel down that tall, marble smooth, ultra lean frame. Wiping some of the juice from his nipple with his thumb & licking it clean as he waved good-bye we learned it's true: when you wish upon a star, a guy like Aiden will make your dreams cum true!
title: Boned and Ready, Scene #02
